From medicine to developer

kevin huOctober 6th 2015

Medicine is a deeply traditional field of practice. But tradition isn't always the best, it can even be harmful. After seeing the inner working  of the medical and healthcare system, I know that it could be better. Better delivery of healthcare, service, and knowledge. 

"Never accept the world as it appears to be,, dare to see it for what it could be." -Overwatch, Harold Winston
